    IafServletFilter  
    Log4jServletContextListener
    The Log4jServletContextListener class uses the ContextClassLoaderRepositorySelector to maintain a separate Log4j configuration for a servlet context and to load the logging configuration from the log4j.xml file specified by the log4jXmlLocation context-param (or /WEB-INF/log4j.xml if not specified).
